examples.example: 我很荣幸能成为这个优秀团队中的一员。

translate.english: I am very honored to be a member of this excellent team.

examples.example: 我很高兴能成为班级这个温暖集体中的一员。

translate.english: I am very glad to be a member of this warm collective in the class.

examples.example: 我很自豪能成为志愿者团队中的一员，为社会贡献自己的力量。

translate.english: I am very proud to be a member of the volunteer team and contribute my strength to the society.
